other_title: アスタロッテのおもちゃ！ (Japanese)
plot: The OAV Astaroette no Omocha Is a three part short story series. In the first story, Lotte and Asuha find themselves searching for details about their school project. In the second bit, is the backstory to how Zelda came to be Lotte's bodyguard. The final of the three, is a flashback of how the queen met Noaya and how they conceived Asuha ten years prior to the events in the anime.
ending_theme: "Manatsu no Photograh" (真夏のフォトグラフ) by azusa
